name: Interlaken Capital
overview:
Interlaken Capital is a private investment company that uses its capital and experience to assist entrepreneurs and managers in building successful businesses. For more than twenty years, they have earned high returns on our equity investments by growing companies in fragmented, basic industries with prudent, leveraged acquisitions. They are active investors and concentrate their attention on a small number of select investments where they can contribute their acquisition know-how, access to capital, financial expertise and operating experience to add value. Further, they are long-term investors who commit to opportunities with the intention of maintaining their investment and involvement well into the future.

Throughout their history, Interlaken has undertaken more than 300 transactions and has assisted in the growth of over 20 corporations. Their roles have been varied and have included participation as entrepreneurs, managers and financial sponsors. Their current portfolio consists of businesses that participate in a variety of basic industries including, insurance, industrial services, manufacturing and industrial distribution. Their affiliated companies generate over $2 billion in revenues while employing more than 5,000
